best_practices: Always acknowledge the customer within 1 hour during business hours
Use the customer's name when addressing them
Summarize the issue to confirm understanding
Follow up even after resolution to ensure satisfaction
Educate customers on self-service options when appropriate
Escalate promptly when beyond your expertise
Keep tickets updated at least daily
Close tickets only after customer confirmation
common_mistakes: Leaving tickets unassigned for extended periods
Not showing empathy for customer frustration
